ca.sandstorm.luminance.gui
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  ca.sandstorm.luminance.gui.Label
      ca.sandstorm.luminance.gui.Button
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWidget
public class Button
extends Label

Standard Button widget.

Author:
Kumaran Vijayan. Modified by Zenja to use a PrimitiveQuad for rendering.

              float y,
              float width,
              float height,

Constructor for creating a Button.

Parameters:
x - X coordinate of the button.
y - Y coordinate of the button.
width - Width of the button.
height - Height of the button.
title - String to be used for the buton title.

Button

public Button(float x,
              float y,
              float width,
              float height,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String textureLocation,
              java.lang.String tappedTextureLocation,
              java.lang.Object callee,
              java.lang.String method)
Constructor for creating a Button with a standard texture, tapped texture, callee and method.

Parameters:
x - X coordinate of the button.
y - Y coordinate of the button.
width - Width of the button.
height - Height of the button.
title - String to be used for the buton title.
textureLocation - The location of the texture to be used for the Button.
tappedTextureLocation - The location of the texture to be used for the Button when it is tapped.
callee - The object to be called with method when the Button is tapped.
method - The string representing the method that will be called on callee when the Button is tapped.

setIsToggle

public void setIsToggle(boolean isToggle)
Set whether a button is a toggle-button or not. If it is, it won't light up on touch-down.

isToggle

public boolean isToggle()
Get whether a button is a toggle-button or not. If it is, it won't light up on touch-down.

getIsTapped

public boolean getIsTapped()
Tells you whether this Button is currently being tapped, indicating which texture is being used to draw itself: the tapped texture (returns true) or the standard texture (returns false).

Returns:
the boolean indicating whether this button is currently being tapped. If true is returned, then the tapped texture is being drawn. If false is returned, then the standard texture is being drawn.

getIsSelected

public boolean getIsSelected()
Find out whether the button is currently in a selected state.

Returns:
the boolean indicating whether this button is in a selected state. If true, the button is selected. If false, the button is not selected.

setIsTapped

public void setIsTapped(boolean isTapped)
Lets you set this Button as being tapped. This boolean will cause the Button to switch between drawing the tapped texture and the standard texture.

Parameters:
isTapped - A boolean indicating whether the Button should draw itself using the tapped texture (isTapped == true) or the standard texture (isTapped == false).

setIsSelected

public void setIsSelected(boolean isSelected)
